display_long_description:
Clock in to Job Life Simulator VR on Meta Quest. A job where deadlines, meetings, emails and presentations collide with pure workplace chaos. Start your job career as an intern, irritate the boss, prank coworkers and attempt real office tasks or fail hilariously.

Manage or avoid everyday job tasks: triage email, do data entry, update spreadsheets, fix documents, prepare presentations, join calls and meetings, manage your calendar, use the task board, and practice real time management and multitasking  all with smooth controller only VR interactions. Play seated or standing with snap turn and comfort settings optimized for Quest 2, Quest 3, and Quest Pro.

Work in a busy office full of characters you’ll love or love to annoy. Send strange memos, spill coffee near the office boy, interrupt meetings, jam the printer (again), escape to the break room, or start a keyboard drum solo in the middle of a deadline. Build your job reputation, earn promotions,  customize your desk and workspace, or remain an intern forever and embrace the chaos.

Play replayable job mini-games including:
📧 Inbox Zero job Sprint – clear emails before the boss appears
📊 Spreadsheet Speedrun – type like your job depends on it
🖨 Printer Jam Boss Fight – defeat the true final enemy of office life
🎤 Presentation Panic – present with total job confidence
and more.

Funny office job life simulator!
